title: Pricing Page V2
description: Reimagined pricing page accommodating VRIFY Predict as a suite with sub-products while VRIFY Present remains standalone. Explores banner and foundation layouts with expanded and accordion module displays.

banner-expanded.name: Banner Expanded
banner-expanded.label: Variant A1
banner-expanded.description: Foundation banner Data Uploader + expanded nested module cards in stacked layout.
banner-expanded.hypothesis: Banner treatment positions Data Uploader as foundational prereq. Expanded cards show full module detail upfront.

banner-accordion.name: Banner Accordion
banner-accordion.label: Variant A2
banner-accordion.description: Foundation banner Data Uploader + collapsible accordion modules for dense layout.
banner-accordion.hypothesis: Banner foundation with accordion modules creates dense layout while allowing on-demand detail exploration.

foundation-expanded.name: Foundation Expanded
foundation-expanded.label: Variant B1
foundation-expanded.description: Foundation band Data Uploader + side-by-side product cards with expanded nested modules.
foundation-expanded.hypothesis: Two-column layout enables direct product comparison while foundation band establishes Data Uploader as underlying prerequisite.

foundation-accordion.name: Foundation Accordion
foundation-accordion.label: Variant B2
foundation-accordion.description: Foundation band Data Uploader + side-by-side product cards with accordion modules.
foundation-accordion.hypothesis: Two-column layout with accordion modules provides compact comparison view with on-demand detail exploration.

targetAudience: C-suite leaders evaluating VRIFY platform products
Technical decision-makers reviewing specifications and capabilities
Procurement teams assessing product features and compliance
